channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Uvalde schools officer did nothing until it was too late during shooting, prosecutor says
item.description: A Texas prosecutor says a school police officer made no attempt to distract or stop the gunman during the school shooting in Uvalde in 2022.

item.title: Fifth anniversary of the Jan. 6 attack brings fresh division to the Capitol
Alaska Airlines pilot who safely landed plane after panel blew out says Boeing unfairly blamed him
